backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining door entry types (single, double, doubleSagwan, laminate coatings) with CRUD operations: addDoor, getAllTypes, getTotalSquareFeet (returns ComputeTotals with per-coating and grand totals), and deleteDoor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence debugging tasks for fixing error loading issues in DoorEntryList and GrandTotals components, plus backend actor availability verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components (forms, lists, displays), hooks (queries, theme), utilities (PDF generation, WhatsApp sharing, fraction parsing, dimension rounding), and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes with wood-inspired neutral palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, title 'Door Measurement & Quotation App', and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component orchestrating customer info form, door entry form/list, grand totals, quotation actions, theme toggle, and footer with state management for customer data and refresh triggers.
frontend/src/components/CustomerInfoForm: Card component with controlled inputs for customer name and mobile number, featuring icon-enhanced fields (User, Phone icons) with large touch targets.
frontend/src/components/DoorEntryDisplay: Empty file (no content provided in truncated source).
frontend/src/components/DoorEntryForm.ts: Form component for adding door dimensions with fraction support; automatically creates entries for all 4 coating types using parsed/rounded dimensions, with form reset capability via imperative ref.
frontend/src/components/DoorEntryList.ts: Displays a table of door entries grouped by size, showing quantities, square footage, and coating costs (single, double, double+sagwan, laminate) with delete functionality and totals footer.
frontend/src/components/GrandTotals.tsx: Shows grand totals card with total square feet and calculated amounts for each coating type (single, double, double+sagwan, laminate) based on predefined rates.
frontend/src/components/QuotationActions: Provides buttons to generate PDF quotations and share via WhatsApp, validating customer info and door entries, then clearing data after successful generation.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Simple button component that toggles between light and dark themes using sun/moon icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on door entries including fetching all entries, calculating totals, adding, deleting single, and deleting all entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages theme state (light/dark) with localStorage persistence and system preference detection, applying theme class to document root.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a wood-inspired color palette for light and dark modes, plus utility classes for touch-friendly targets.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/coatingRates.ts: Defines constant pricing rates in Rupees for four coating types: single (₹185), double (₹220), double sagwan (₹270), and laminate (₹450) per square foot.
frontend/src/utils/dimensionRounding.ts: Provides functions to round door heights (72-84 inches) and widths (30-48 inches) to standard Indian carpenter sizes based on threshold rules.
frontend/src/utils/fractionParser.ts: Parses and validates door dimension inputs supporting decimal and fraction formats (eighths), with conversion utilities between decimal and fraction display formats.
frontend/src/utils/pdfGenerator.ts: Generates HTML quotation documents from door entries, grouping by size, calculating coating costs, and formatting with customer details and totals.
Calculates square footage from rounded door dimensions using the formula (height × width) / 144.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappShare.ts: Shares quotation PDFs via WhatsApp using Web Share API when available, falling back to WhatsApp Web with pre-filled message and manual attachment instructions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom colors using OKLCH color space, border radius variables, custom fonts, animations, and typography/container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking three feature requests to debug and fix errors in DoorEntryList and GrandTotals components related to useQuery hooks and backend actor methods.
